com.joliciel.talismane.stats

Class FScoreCalculator<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.stats.FScoreCalculator<E>

  • public class FScoreCalculator<E>
extends Object
    Calculates the f-score for a given classification task.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli
